QuestData.Title: Basic Skulltaking
QuestData.Description: My hunters are all dead, you will be my hunting pack now.$b$bFind their bodies and take their skulls. I will choose which to honor and which to cast aside. It is our way.$b$bI will go further and see what other skulls may be found here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the skulls from $1oa dead Skulltakers.
QuestData.RewardText: This red slime covers everything, even the skulls of my hunters! I'll make a Skulltaker of you yet though, great work!
